entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
